CypressError: `cy.request()` failed on:

http://localhost:5000/api/user/resign

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 400: Bad Request

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

Method: POST
URL: http://localhost:5000/api/user/resign
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "Authorization": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjY4M2I1YTg3MGI4OTk4ZDc0N2FjMzM0NCIsInJvbGUiOiJFTVBMT1lFRSIsImlhdCI6MTc0ODcyMDI2MywiZXhwIjoxNzQ5MzI1MDYzfQ.6dM_lX1RxxSB2TFgANEfuusv5gL1IWHTcxsYj14PN9k",

  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",

  "content-length": 39
}
Body: {"intendedLastWorkingDay":"2024-12-26"}

-----------------------------------------------------------

CypressError: `cy.request()` failed on:

http://localhost:5000/api/admin/conclude_resignation

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 404: Not Found

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: PUT
URL: http://localhost:5000/api/admin/conclude_resignation
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "Authorization": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjY4M2I1NGUyNTEwYTk3MzkzZjExM2IzZSIsInJvbGUiOiJIUiIsImlhdCI6MTc0ODcyMDI2NCwiZXhwIjoxNzQ5MzI1MDY0fQ.9BBx-6oyB7mQy4Xb8IqJM5oMJ1e0GUb_KREqOuscAIQ",

  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "content-length": 37
}
Body: {"approved":true,"lwd":"26 Dec 2024"}

-----------------------------------------------------------
